response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your operations. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure such a high-quality asset at a discount. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 950000}
